name: RezLand
description:
RezLand is a game created for the lowrezjam. the game is in 64 bits scaled up. You play an adventurer who need to kill monster and the final boss the minautor.  The Game is developped with a personnal Game Engine created with SDL in C++.

Optional Theme : Minibeast

CONTROLS:

W,A,S,D -> Move

Q->Take Potion

LeftClick ->Attack

Space->Dash

E->look arround when you have the item -> and W,A,S,D to move the camera.
